Class PacketCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.PacketCreator

  • public class PacketCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates Packets to send to the client
    Author:
    Faythless

      • getLoginError

        public static Packet getLoginError(java.lang.String errorMsg)
        Sends an error message to the client specifying that there has been an error in the login process. This terminates the client's login attempt.
        Parameters:
        errorMsg - The message to send to the client, such as "Invalid username."
        Returns:

      • getVerify

        public static Packet getVerify(byte[] verifyHash)
        Sends a verify message to the client specifying that the server has accepted the client's login. The verify message is used by the client to know that the server is authentic.
        Parameters:
        verifyHash - Hash([ServerNonce].[ClientNonce].[Password])
        Returns:

      • getPlayer

        public static Packet getPlayer(Player player)
        A packet containing all of a player's information. This should be sent right after a player has logged in (and optionally chosen their world).
        Parameters:
        player - The client's player
        Returns:
        Packet containing all information of a client's player

      • getChunk

        public static Packet getChunk(long chunkId)
        A packet containing all of the blocks that make up a chunk.
        Parameters:
        chunkId - The unique chunk ID that identifies this chunk
        Returns:
        Packet containing [header][chunkId][blocks]
